function descendingComparator(a,b,orderBy){if(b[orderBy]<a[orderBy]){return-1;}if(b[orderBy]>a[orderBy]){return 1;}return 0;}function getComparator(order,orderBy){return order==='desc'?function(a,b){return descendingComparator(a,b,orderBy);}:function(a,b){return-descendingComparator(a,b,orderBy);};}function applySortFilter(array,comparator,query){var stabilizedThis=array.map(function(el,index){return[el,index];});stabilizedThis.sort(function(a,b){var order=comparator(a[0],b[0]);if(order!==0)return order;return a[1]-b[1];});if(query){return filter(array,function(_user){return _user.name.toLowerCase().indexOf(query.toLowerCase())!==-1;});}return stabilizedThis.map(function(el){return el[0];});}
